main_composition: three-quarter view of a single young woman leaning casually against a rough textured concrete wall corner, one leg bent with foot pressed flat against a gold ancient door, right hand lifting the high side slit of her dress to reveal upper thigh, left hand relaxed near hem, intense seductive gaze directed at camera with slight head tilt and parted lips, dramatic low-key lighting emphasizing contours and jewelry, moody industrial setting

subject.description: beautiful Ana de armas in her mid-20s, sophisticated feminine features with bold evening makeup (sharp winged eyeliner, contoured cheeks, deep red matte lipstick, subtle highlighter), shoulder-length wavy dark brown hair with soft side part and loose strands framing face, fair smooth skin with natural subtle glow
subject.clothing: elegant deep red cremisi satin/silk halter-neck evening gown with extreme plunging V-neckline reaching navel, open back design, high left-side slit to upper thigh, flowing floor-length skirt with slight asymmetry and train
subject.details: large sparkling diamond hoop earrings, multi-layer pearl and diamond choker necklace, elaborate sparkling diamond cuff bracelet on left wrist, manicured hands with neutral polish, confident sultry expression with direct eye contact, small beauty mark on left cheek

environment.foreground: worn textured concrete wall corner with visible cracks, weathering, and rough surface details
environment.midground: woman dominant and centered against the wall, dress fabric draping elegantly
environment.background: dim shadowed industrial concrete walls forming a corner, no additional elements, creating enclosed moody atmosphere

lighting_and_atmosphere: dramatic low-key directional lighting from upper left, strong chiaroscuro with deep shadows on right side and bright rim highlights on face, hair, jewelry, and satin fabric, cool moody tones with subtle warm skin accents, intense sensual high-fashion vibe with cinematic contrast, photorealistic detail
technical_quality: highly detailed, sharp focus on facial features, jewelry sparkle, satin sheen, and fabric folds, 8k resolution, realistic diamond reflections and skin texture, professional editorial fashion photography style with natural shallow depth of field and subtle film-like grain
negative_prompt_suggestions: blurry, deformed, extra limbs, harsh overhead lighting, overexposed jewelry, underexposed dress details, low quality, cartoon, anime, text watermark, extra people, bright daylight, cluttered background, unnatural skin tones
